Bitte inspiziere die Himmelsfestung, um sicherzustellen, dass sie flugtüchtig ist.
Gab es irgendwelche Probleme mit der Himmelsfestung?
Sie ist ein wenig eingestaubt, aber die Motoren laufen noch.
Was für eine Erleichterung. Ich werde bald wieder nach dir rufen lassen.
$MyPCName$, komm mal kurz her.
Hmm ... Irgendetwas stimmt nicht.
Das hat etwas mit, ähm ... dieser roten Frucht zu tun. Du weißt schon. Der aus der Maple-Welt ...
Du meinst die $item:30000232$?
Hm? Hat jemand was von „$item:30000232$n“ gesagt?!
Du hast dich verhört, Kondor! Du hast dich einfach nur verhört ...
Hmpf. Diese Höhe muss wohl mein Gehör beeinträchtigen ...
Leise, $MyPCName$. Meinen Forschungen zufolge kommen $itemPlural:30000232$ auch auf Kritias vor. Sie sind auf ganzer Linie identisch mit den Kirschen in der Maple-Welt. Auf ganzer Linie.
Ich brauche sie. Für meine, ähm ... meine Forschung, verstehst du? Schnell ... und diskret ... sammle ein paar $itemPlural:30000232$ für mich.
Sammle ein paar ... $itemPlural:30000232$ für mich. Schnell ... und diskret.
Diesen Geruch würde ich überall erkennen. Ich werde sie gut einsetzen!
Zur Forschung meinst du?
Hab ich das nicht gesagt? Lass mich mit meinen Krischen allein, $male:Mann,female:Fräulein$.
Wir haben so viele verwundete Soldaten. Das ist nichts Neues. Aber es ist schwer, ausreichend medizinischen Nachschub aus dem Reich zu beschaffen.

Frag mich nicht, wie er das entdeckt hat, aber einer meiner Ritter hat herausgefunden, dass ein regionales Kraut namens $item:30001299$ ein effektives Schmerzmittel ist. Die Pflanze wächst an der $map:02020032$.
$item:30001299$ kann nur geerntet werden, während der Müde Arum schläft.
Bitte untersuche die Kreatur namens $npcName:25020705$ an der $map:02020032$ und ernte etwas $item:30001299$.
Bitte untersuche die Kreatur namens $npcName:25020705$ an der $map:02020032$ und ernte etwas $item:30001299$.
Ja, das sollte reichen. Zumindest fürs Erste.
Zumindest weiß ich jetzt, wen ich fragen kann, wenn ich noch mehr brauche.
Erinnerst du dich noch an die Robotersoldaten, die $npcName:11004430[gender:0]$ gehackt hat? Unsere Forscher nahmen sich an ihm ein Beispiel und experimentierten mit der gleichen Technik herum.
Nach vielen schlaflosen Nächten gelang es ihnen schließlich, einige dieser Roboter zu fangen und zu hacken.
<font size='45'>!</font>
Doch leider war der Hackingversuch nicht ganz präzise. Die Roboter müssen ständig angepasst werden, damit sie nicht aus der Reihe tanzen.
Ich glaube, es wäre gut, wenn du mal beim Labor vorbeischaust, ob sie irgendwelche Updates zu der Sache haben.
Ich glaube, es wäre gut, wenn du mal beim Labor vorbeischaust, ob sie irgendwelche Updates zu der Sache haben.
Wie lautet der Bericht?
Es läuft nicht alles glatt, aber sie kommen klar.
Verstehe. Ich werde das Projekt weiterhin genau beobachten.
Die Rafflesien auf der $map:02020013$ vergiften alles um sie herum. Die $npcNamePlural:11004342[gender:0]$ dort werden dadurch sehr wütend.
Als Tempelritter kann ich einfach nicht herumsitzen und zusehen, wie diese Kreaturen leiden. Sie müssen von ihrem Zorn befreit werden!
Begib dich zur $map:02020013$ und beruhige die verärgerten Boings.
Begib dich zur $map:02020013$ und beruhige die verärgerten Boings.
Sind die $npcNamePlural:11004342[gender:0]$ friedlich geworden?
Ich glaube schon?
Ich nehme ich beim Wort. Danke, $MyPCName$.
Warst du schon mal im $map:02020014$? Es heißt, dort wachsen prachtvolle Kirschblütenbäume.
Kirschblüten als Kulisse für Maschinen ... Ich hätte gern die Blüten von so einem Baum. Kannst du mir welche bringen?
Du willst ... Blüten?
Zwing mich nicht, noch einmal zu fragen. Bitte.
Okay! Überlass das ruhig mir.
Du hast meinen Dank. $itemPlural:30001300$ können im $map:02020014$ gefunden werden.
$itemPlural:30001300$ können im $map:02020014$ gefunden werden.
Hast du die Blüten?
Also ... Für wen sind sie?
Nun ja ...
Für mich! Ich brauche etwas Hübsches, das zu meinem strahlenden Scharfsinn passt.
Das $map:02020014$ ist eine wahre Fundgrube an Informationen über Kritias. Es schafft einen Mikrokosmos von Lebensräumen, die unsere Forscher untersuchen können.
Leider haben wir den Kontakt zu unseren Forschern dort verloren. Ich mache mir Sorgen um ihre Sicherheit.
Begib dich zum $map:02020014$ und sieh nach, ob sie in Sicherheit sind.
Begib dich zum $map:02020014$ und sieh nach, ob sie in Sicherheit sind.
Waren die Forscher in Sicherheit?
Sagen wir einfach, dass sie in Sicherheit sind und sich um ihre Forschungen kümmern.
... Ich verstehe.
Ich nehme an, ich sollte einen detaillierteren Bericht direkt von ihnen einholen.
Einer unserer Späher hat offenbar eine Brutstätte der Wesplinge entdeckt.
Sie liegt im Norden des Verlassenen Staatsgebäudes. Wir müssen diese Kreaturen untersuchen, damit wir verstehen, wie wir die Wesplinge effizienter bekämpfen können.
Ich möchte, dass du die Gegend sicherst.
Ich möchte, dass du die Gegend sicherst.
Konntest du das Gebiet sichern?
Nun ja, es ist so sicher, wie es nur geht.
Verstehe. Vielleicht sollte ich die Forscher von Tempelrittern eskortieren lassen ...
Warst du schon mal in $map:02020018$? Es liegt viel höher als alle anderen Orte in Kritias.
Anders als die restlichen Orte dieses Kontinents scheint dieser von Technologie fast unberührt. Vielleicht wächst hier deshalb diese einzigartige Pflanze – das Tiaman-Himmelskraut.
Jeden morgen sammelt sich an diesem Kraut $item:30001301$. Bringe mir etwas davon.
Sammle: $item:30001301$.
Hast du den Tiamanischen Himmelstau mitgebracht?
<font color="#909090">(Du zeigst ihm den Tau.)</font>
Interessant. Ich spüre eine einzigartige Schwingung von diesem Tau ausgehen ... Ich werde dich wissen lassen, wenn ich auf etwas Interessantes stoße.
Ich habe einen interessanten Bericht erhalten. Scheinbar haben die Pflanzen auf der $map:02020037$ einen ungewöhnlich hohen Aetheringehalt.
Ich muss dir nicht sagen, dass Aetherin eine äußerst wertvolle Energiequelle ist. Ich frage mich, ob es eine Möglichkeit gibt, eine brauchbare Menge aus diesen Pflanzen zu extrahieren.
Wie du dir vielleicht denken kannst, möchte ich dich mit dieser Aufgabe betrauen.
Begib dich zur $map:02020037$ und pflücke ein paar Blumen.
Begib dich zur $map:02020037$ und pflücke ein paar Blumen.
Hm. Auf den ersten Blick sehen diese $itemPlural:30001302$ überhaupt nicht ungewöhnlich aus.
Das ruft nach einer näheren Analyse. Ich werde bald wieder nach dir rufen lassen.
Ist Kritias nicht toll? So, so toll. So viele Dinge, die es zu entdecken gibt. Manche sind davon vielleicht überwältigt, aber ich nicht! Nein, ich liebe es, mich durch seitenweise Daten zu wühlen ...
Beispielsweise müssen wir mehr über die regionalen Monster erfahren. Wir dürfen ihnen schließlich unsere Späher nicht zum Fraß vorwerfen.
Ich möchte, dass du dir die Monster in unserer Nähe genauer ansiehst. Klingt das nicht aufregend?
Oh, ja. Super spannend.
Ich wusste doch, dass du auch so denkst!

Bezwinge $npcNamePlural:25020003$ im $map:02020029$, $npcNamePlural:25020103[gender:0]$ in $map:02020030$ und $npcNamePlural:25020203$ in $map:02020031$. Komme wieder, sobald du genug Daten gesammelt hast!

Bezwinge $npcNamePlural:25020003$ im $map:02020029$, $npcNamePlural:25020103[gender:0]$ in $map:02020030$ und $npcNamePlural:25020203$ in $map:02020031$. Komme wieder, sobald du genug Daten gesammelt hast!
Gute Arbeit! Diese Daten werden einen erheblichen Unterschied für unsere Teams da draußen machen. Sobald ich Zeit finde, sie zu analysieren ...
Bitte sei vorsichtig dort draußen. Wir zählen schließlich alle auf dich!

Wir haben noch nicht viele Informationen über die zahlreichen feindlichen Wesen hier. Einige unserer Späher haben berichtet, dass sie auf wirklich eigenartige Bösewichte gestoßen sind, aber ich konnte noch niemanden entbehren, der sie sich genauer ansieht.
Uff. Was ist, wenn sie weglaufen, bevor wir sie studieren können?
Ich kann helfen, wenn du magst.
Würdest du das wirklich tun?! Bei den gemeldeten Feinden handelt es sich um $npcNamePlural:25020101[gender:0]$ in $map:02020030$ und $npcNamePlural:25020201$ in $map:02020031$!
Halt die Augen nach allem offen, was diese Feinde besonders oder einzigartig machen könnte. Ich bin so froh, dich dabei zu haben, $MyPCName$!
Bei den Feinden, die du untersuchst, handelt es sich um $npcNamePlural:25020101[gender:0]$ in $map:02020030$ und $npcNamePlural:25020201$ in $map:02020031$!
Und? Wie eigenartig waren sie denn nun?
Sie sahen für mich wie ganz normale Bösewichte aus.
Hat sich mein Späher geirrt? Hm. Ich gebe noch nicht auf! Nicht, wenn sich vielleicht die Chance bietet, ein wirklich abgefahrenes Monster zu entdecken!
Ich habe gerade an dich gedacht, $MyPCName$. Ich brauche deine Hilfe.
Was ist los?

Offenbar können wir niemanden in folgende Gebiete schicken: $map:02020004$, $map:02020001$ und $map:02020006$. Alle werden dort schwer verletzt. Unsere Leute brauchen Hilfe, aber wie soll ich ihnen Vorräte schicken, wenn all diese Monster dort lauern?

Bitte bezwinge $npcNamePlural:25020405[gender:0]$ in $map:02020004$, $npcNamePlural:25020502$ am $map:02020001$ und $npcNamePlural:25020303$ an der $map:02020006$, damit ich den Leuten meine Hilfe überbringen kann.

Bitte bezwinge $npcNamePlural:25020405[gender:0]$ in $map:02020004$, $npcNamePlural:25020502$ am $map:02020001$ und $npcNamePlural:25020303$ an der $map:02020006$, damit ich den Leuten meine Hilfe überbringen kann.
Dank dir können unsere Leute da draußen wieder durchatmen.
Ich habe keine Ahnung, wann noch mehr Monster auftauchen werden, aber wenn es so weit ist, weiß ich, an wen ich mich wenden kann.
$MyPCName$, $MyPCName$! Sieh dir das an!
Was ist los?
Ich habe eine neue Hypothese und brauche deine Hilfe, um sie zu beweisen, bevor $npcName:11004316[gender:0]$ hereinschneit und die Lorbeeren erntet!
Ich habe mir auch die ganze Nacht um die Ohren geschlagen. Okay, sag mir, was du davon hältst: Die blauen Monster von Kritias habe alle etwas gemein!
Eine brillante Hypothese, ich weiß, aber ich brauche deine Hilfe, um sie zu beweisen. Bitte untersuche $npcNamePlural:25020302$ an der $map:02020006$ und $npcNamePlural:25020505$ am $map:02020001$!
Bitte bezwinge $npcNamePlural:25020302$ auf der $map:02020006$ und $npcNamePlural:25020505$ am $map:02020001$!
Und jetzt machen wir uns an die Ergebnisse!
Ich kann nichts finden, was sie verbindet ...
Unmöglich! Okay, dann muss ich mir erneut die Nacht um die Ohren schlagen. Ich werde diesen dusseligen Tempelritter schon noch verblüffen ...

Vielleicht hast du schon bemerkt, dass wir ein wenig ... überfordert sind. Ich habe Leute über den ganzen Kontinent gejagt und planlos Proben nehmen lassen. Ich glaube, es wäre einfacher, wenn wir ein bisschen Ordnung in dieses Chaos bringen.
Ich stelle gerade Kategorien von Monstern auf, die du untersuchen sollst. Fangen wir mit der Kategorie der merkwürdig geformten Roboter an!

Bitte bezwinge $npcNamePlural:25020605$ in der $map:02020010$, $npcNamePlural:25020807$ in der $map:02020034$ und $npcNamePlural:25021001$ in der $map:02020016$, um herauszufinden, wie sie sich trotz ihrer merkwürdigen Formen fortbewegen können.
Bitte bekämpfe $npcNamePlural:25020605$ in der $map:02020010$, $npcNamePlural:25020807$ in der $map:02020034$ und $npcNamePlural:25021001$ in der $map:02020016$.
Wie ist die Nachforschung gelaufen?
Die waren genauso merkwürdig, wie du sagtest.
Wunderbar! Aber ... das war überhaupt nicht so hilfreich, wie ich dachte! Vielleicht muss ich meine Kategorien überarbeiten ...
Nun ja, ich gebe noch nicht auf!
Als wir hier ankamen, dachte ich, Kritias wäre ein Land der Maschinen. Aber wie sich herausgestellt hat, gibt es hier noch eine Menge anderer interessanter Kreaturen!
Ich muss immer an die $npcNamePlural:11004342$ denken. Wie ich höre, leben in dieser Gegend verschiedene Spezies.
Ich möchte mehr herausfinden! Geh und studiere $npcNamePlural:25020704$ an der $map:02020032$ und $npcNamePlural:25020905$ an der $map:02020013$. Bitte!
Geh und studiere $npcNamePlural:25020704$ an der $map:02020032$ und $npcNamePlural:25020905$ an der $map:02020013$, bitte!
Also, welche Unterschiede konntest du zwischen den beiden Arten feststellen?
Sie hatten unterschiedliche Farben.
Aha! Ich wusste es. Das nächste Mal müssen wir das genauer untersuchen!
Hey, könntest du mir einen klitzekleinen Gefallen tun?
Sag einfach Bescheid.
Ich bin unsere Daten zu den Monstern von Kritias durchgegangen und habe dabei festgestellt, dass wir über einige Monstern nur sehr wenig wissen. Das ist völlig inakzeptabel!
Bitte sammle Daten über $npcNamePlural:25021102$ auf der $map:02020051$, $npcNamePlural:25021203$ im Gebiet $map:02020017$ und $npcNamePlural:25021401$ im $map:02020014$.
Bitte sammle Daten über $npcNamePlural:25021102$ auf der $map:02020051$, $npcNamePlural:25021203$ im Gebiet $map:02020017$ und $npcNamePlural:25021401$ im $map:02020014$.
Da hast du aber einen ganzen Batzen an Daten mitgebracht!
Danke. Ich werde diese neuen Informationen schnellstmöglich hochladen.
Ich habe mir unsere Datenbank zu mechanischen Monstern von Kritias angesehen und festgestellt, dass einige Einträge leer sind.
Wir müssen sie mit relevanten Daten füllen. $MyPCName$, du hilfst mir doch dabei, oder?
Studiere und kämpfe gegen $npcNamePlural:25021104$ auf der $map:02020051$ und $npcNamePlural:25021201$ beim Verlassenen Staatsgebäude.
Studiere und kämpfe gegen $npcNamePlural:25021104$ auf der $map:02020051$ und $npcNamePlural:25021201$ beim Verlassenen Staatsgebäude.
Das sind hervorragende Datensätze! Mit jedem Tag lernen wir mehr über diesen Ort.
Es ist nur eine Frage der Zeit, bis wir ideale Maßnahmen gegen diese mechanischen Monster entwickeln können. Ich kann es kaum erwarten!
$MyPCName$! Wir stecken in Schwierigkeiten!
Beruhige dich und erzähle mir, was geschehen ist.
Wenn die Berichte stimmen, wollen Kharon und Tairen die regionalen Pflanzenmonster dazu bringen, uns anzugreifen!
Wenn diese grünen Biester mitmischen, werden wir nicht lange durchhalten!
Dann sollte ich zuerst zuschlagen.
Oh, das würdest du tun? Du bist ein wahrer Lebensretter!
Ich erledige nur meine Arbeit.
Vielen Dank! Bezwinge $npcNamePlural:25021801$ im $map:02020008$, $npcNamePlural:25021603$ auf dem $map:02020009$ und $npcNamePlural:25022101$ auf der $map:02020037$.
Bezwinge $npcNamePlural:25021801$ im $map:02020008$, $npcNamePlural:25021603$ auf dem $map:02020009$ und $npcNamePlural:25022101$ auf der $map:02020037$.
Wie ist es gelaufen?
Dieses Unkraut wird uns jedenfalls nicht so schnell wieder behelligen.
Danke nochmal! Wenn ich das nächste Mal tödliche Gartenprobleme habe, wende ich mich an dich.
Ich habe mir die Späherberichte angesehen und bin zu einer wichtigen Schlussfolgerung gekommen: Diese Typen von der Dämonenarmee verheißen nichts Gutes!
Wenn wir uns um sie kümmern, kann sich Humanitas um Tairen kümmern.
Also, hast du Lust, die Dämonenarmee in die Knie zu zwingen? Bezwinge $npcNamePlural:25021901$ in der $map:02020035$ und $npcNamePlural:25022002$ beim $map:02020036$.
Bezwinge $npcNamePlural:25021901$ auf dem $map:02020035$ und $npcNamePlural:25022002$ beim $map:02020036$.
Gute Arbeit! Humanitas ist sicher auch dankbar.
Ich bin mir sicher, dass es nur eine Frage der Zeit ist, bis die Dämonenarmee zurückkommt. Ich bin froh, dich auf unserer Seite zu haben!
Hast du schon von dem riesigen $npcName:11004342[gender:0]$ auf der $map:02020006$ gehört? Es heißt, dass du einen großen Schatz findest, wenn es dir gelingt, sein Herz zu erweichen!
Ich glaube, an diesem Gerücht ist etwas dran.
Um das mit Sicherheit herauszufinden, müssen wir es selbst ausprobieren!
Begib dich zur $map:02020006$ und finde heraus, ob das Gerücht stimmt!
Begib dich zur $map:02020006$ und finde heraus, ob das Gerücht stimmt!
Und? Konntest du das Herz des riesigen $npcName:11004342[gender:0]$s erweichen?!
Das habe ich getan, und er hat mir als Belohnung einen Schatz gegeben!
Wirklich?! Ich kann nicht glauben, dass das Gerücht tatsächlich wahr ist! Wow!
Nun ja, das kann nichts Gutes bedeuten ...
Was ist los?
Ich habe eine Mission nach $map:02020031$ autorisiert, da sich die Lage dort beruhigt hatte, aber jetzt habe ich den Kontakt zum Team verloren.
Dieser Ort ist nicht wirklich sicher. Und die Monster sind wild.
Was ist, wenn sie verletzt sind? Kannst du nach ihnen sehen?
Bitte stelle sicher, dass unsere Leute in $map:02020031$ sicher sind.
Geht’s dem Team gut?
Die Robotersoldaten haben ihnen ein paar Probleme bereitet, aber es geht ihnen gut.
Da bin ich aber froh, aber was ist mit der Funkstille? Das ist wirklich merkwürdig ...
Während unsere Leute Kritias erkunden, kommen ihnen alle möglichen Gerüchte zu Ohren. Faszinierende Gerüchte.
Zum Beispiel soll in der $map:02020034$ eine mysteriöse Maschine sein, bei deren Benutzung ein glänzender Ring am Himmel erscheint.

Das ist albern, oder? Aber ich kann einfach nicht aufhören, daran zu denken! Würdest du dorthin gehen und den Apparat ausfindig machen? Und wenn wirklich ein Ring erscheint, fliege mit einem Flugmobil hindurch.
Ich kann deinen Bericht kaum abwarten!
Bitte geh dem Gerücht über die $map:02020034$ nach!
Und? Ist ein glänzender Ring am Himmel erschienen?
Er ist tatsächlich erschienen.
Ha. Dieser Ort überrascht mich immer wieder. Ich kann es kaum erwarten, dieses seltsame Phänomen selbst zu untersuchen.
Bist du bereit für das neueste Gerücht? Frisch eingetroffen von meinen Feldforschern!
Meine Agenten in der $map:02020016$ sagen, dass es dort eine Maschine gibt, die Blüten zum Erblühen bringen kann.
Ah, $npcName:11004315$, ich dachte, du wärst ein Technikfreak. Aber in deinem Herzen bist du immer noch eine Grünkapuze. Sollen wir für dich am Außenposten einen Garten anlegen?
Ich bin da mehr als neugierig. Bitte sieh nach, ob die Gerüchte über die $map:02020016$ wahr sind!
... Plötzlich fühle ich mich, als würde ich ignoriert werden.
Bitte geh dem Gerücht über die $map:02020016$ nach!
Existiert die Maschine tatsächlich? Das kann doch nicht sein, oder?
Sie war tatsächlich da. Aber das war noch nicht alles – beim Benutzen erschien eine Schatztruhe!
Wie ist das möglich? Ist das Wissenschaft? Oder Magie ...?
Unsere Soldaten an der $map:02020032$ haben ein merkwürdiges Gerücht aufgeschnappt. Es heißt, dass an den Fernrohren Abenteurer herumlungern und dann plötzlich ganz schnell davonlaufen.
Ist das ein neuer Joggingwahn? Ich habe keine Ahnung.
Auch der Hauptmann der Vorhut möchte wissen, was da vor sich geht. Könntest du zur $map:02020032$ gehen und das herausfinden?
Begib dich zur $map:02020032$ und finde die Wahrheit heraus.
Konntest du herausfinden, warum die Abenteurer so wild durch die Gegend rennen? Das muss ja einen Grund haben, oder?
Da geht etwas vor sich, aber ich sag‘s dir nicht!
$MyPCName$?! Wohin gehst du denn? Halt!
Das Gerücht des Tages betrifft das $map:02020014$.
Gerüchten zufolge gibt es im $map:02020014$ einen Apparat, der Plattformen in der Luft erscheinen lässt.
Das klingt wie aus einem Fantasieroman! Wie könnte ich einem solchen Gerücht widerstehen?
Ich überlasse dir das.
Begib dich zum $map:02020014$ und finde heraus, ob das Gerücht stimmt!
Sind die Gerüchte wahr? Sind wirklich Plattformen in der Luft erschienen?
Das stimmt.
Wow! Wie ist das möglich? Ich muss mir das selbst ansehen.
Das Gerücht des Tages betrifft das Verlassene Staatsgebäude.
Es gibt noch einen Apparat, der glänzende Ringe am Himmel erscheinen lässt. Ich frage mich, ob es sich dabei um den gleichen Apparat wie zuvor handelt.
Wofür sind diese Apparate? Das möchte ich herausfinden.
Begib dich zum $map:02020017$ und finde heraus, ob das Gerücht stimmt!
Und? War es der gleiche Ring? Oder ein anderer?
Der gleiche Ring.
Hm ... Es muss da irgendein Muster geben. Lassen wir eine Simulation laufen!
Erinnerst du dich an diese merkwürdigen Plattformen von vorhin?
Auch in $map:02020018$ wurden welche entdeckt!
Wir haben keine Zeit zu verlieren. Wir müssen uns das mit eigenen Augen ansehen. Äh, mit DEINEN eigenen Augen!
Begib dich zum $map:02020018$ und finde heraus, ob das Gerücht stimmt!
Es sind die gleichen, oder?
Ja. Ganz oben war auch eine Truhe.
Irgendwann werde ich der Sache schon auf den Grund gehen. Sie müssen doch einen besonderen Zweck haben!
Erinnerst du dich an das Gerücht über diesen glänzenden Himmelsring?
Einer unserer Späher hat einen in der $map:02020035$ gesichtet.
Leider konnte er sich das nicht genauer ansehen. Aber sicher kannst du das!
Begib dich zum $map:02020035$ und finde heraus, ob das Gerücht stimmt!
Also, was ist passiert, als du durch den Ring geflogen bist?
Am Ende war eine Truhe.
Meine Hypothese war nicht falsch! Noch ein paar Beweise mehr und ich könnte eine ausgearbeitete Theorie vorlegen!
Hör mal, erinnerst du dich an das Gerücht über den riesigen $npcName:11004342[gender:0]$?
Wie konnte ich das nur vergessen?

Wir haben noch einen auf dem $map:02020009$ gefunden. Keine Ahnung, was er bewacht, aber ich habe irgendwie Mitleid mit ihm. Er muss sich so langweilen, wie er da den ganzen Tag an einer Stelle steht!
Ah ja, die Grünkapuzen: Freunde und Beschützer der Gelangweilten und Einsamen.
$MyPCName$, schenkst du diesem $npcName:11004342[gender:0]$ die Freiheit?
... Kann mich niemand hören? Bin ich ein Geist?
Bitte schenke dem $npcName:11004342[gender:0]$ auf dem $map:02020009$ die Freiheit.
Hast du dem $npcName:11004342[gender:0]$ die Freiheit geschenkt?
Ich nehme an ... ja?
Super. Ich weiß, dass ich Depressionen bekommen würde, müsste ich den ganzen Tag an einer Stelle stehen.
Erinnerst du dich an den merkwürdigen Apparat, der Blüten zum Blühen gebracht hat?
Im $map:02020008$ wurde noch einer gesichtet! Diesmal werde ich sicher herausfinden, wie das funktioniert!
Begib dich zum $map:02020008$ und lüfte das Geheimnis des Apparats!
Begib dich zum $map:02020008$ und lüfte das Geheimnis des Apparats!
Ich fühle mich, als wartete ich schon den ganzen Tag! Was ist passiert, als du den Apparat bedient hast?
Eine Truhe ist erschienen. Das war cool.
Das ist alles? Da muss doch noch mehr dahinterstecken! Geh sofort zurück!
$npcName:11004437[gender:1]$, es bringt nichts, wenn du die Beherrschung verlierst. Wo bleibt deine Objektivität als Wissenschaftlerin?
Sag das noch einmal!
... Ich werde jetzt gehen. $MyPCName$, ich empfehle dir, das Gleiche zu tun.
Es wurde noch ein Apparat gesichtet, der Blumen zum Erblühen bringt. Er befindet sich auf der $map:02020037$.
Ich habe immer noch nicht entschlüsselt, wie das funktioniert. Und an dieser Stelle kommst du ins Spiel.
Begib dich zur $map:02020037$ und lüfte das Geheimnis des Apparats!
Begib dich zum $map:02020037$ und lüfte das Geheimnis des Apparats!
Hast du diesmal irgendwelche Ergebnisse zu berichten? Oder ist es wieder das Gleiche?
Ich glaube, die Anzahl der Blüten spielt eine Rolle.
Die Anzahl der Blüten? Daran hatte ich noch gar nicht gedacht ... Gut beobachtet!
Erinnerst du dich an das eigenartige Gerücht über herumrennende Abenteurer? Meine Späher haben mir ein paar Infos dazu geben können!
Oh, also weißt du schon davon. Na super ...
Hast du Schuldgefühle, weil du das letze Mal den gesamten Schatz für dich behalten wolltest? Keine Sorge. Ich weiß schon, wie du es wieder gut machen kannst!
Begib dich zur $map:02020033$ und finde heraus, was am Ende des Laufs ist!
Begib dich zur $map:02020033$ und finde heraus, was am Ende des Laufs ist!
Hast du das Ende erreicht? Was hast du dort vorgefunden?!
Es war eine Schatztruhe.
Noch eine Truhe? Genau wie die anderen? Hmm ... Meine Prognose war falsch. Ich muss meinen Algorithmus anpassen.
Die geheimnisvollen herumrennenden Abenteurer von Kritias wurden am $map:02020036$ gesichtet.
Ich kann das Gerücht nicht ignorieren. Gibt es ein Muster bei diesen Schatzläufen? Was haben sie mit Fernrohren zu tun?
Begib dich zum $map:02020036$ und absolviere selbst den Lauf.
Begib dich zum $map:02020036$ und absolviere selbst den Lauf.
Und? Wie ist es gelaufen?
Ich bin bis zum Ende gelaufen!
Wow! Glückwunsch. Du musst– Ich meine, erzähl mir von deinen Ergebnissen.
Ich sollte Ergebnisse mitbringen? Ich dachte, ich sollte nur laufen.
Das nächste Mal musst du Ergebnisse mitbringen! Du musst!
$MyPCName$, Ich habe eine Bitte ...
Du scheinst nervös zu sein, aber ... okay.
Wir haben einen Forscher namens $npcName:11004485[gender:0]$ auf dem $map:02020009$. Problem ist nur ... Ich habe keine Ahnung, wonach er eigentlich forscht.
Er gehört nicht zu deinen Leuten?
Nun ja ... das weiß irgendwie niemand. Er steht im Verzeichnis, aber niemand hat tatsächlich mal mit ihm gesprochen!
Wie konnten wir das zulassen? Begib dich zum $map:02020009$ und finde heraus, was $npcName:11004485[gender:0]$ macht!
Begib dich zum $map:02020009$ und finde heraus, was $npcName:11004485[gender:0]$ macht!
Was macht er?
Irgendwas mit Bohrungen?
Ahh. Verstehe. Vielleicht ... Vielleicht wäre es das Beste, wenn wir ihn einfach dort lassen ...
Welcome, $MyPCName$. Your decision to help Humanitas... I would like to thank you once more.
(Say that you will help with whatever they need.)
As you know, the path was blocked with the appearance of the Daemon Army and we couldn't help the residents of <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> in the past.
Now we can help them since the Maple Alliance entered the northern part of Kidel.
Could you go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> and meet their leader, <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004574[gender:1]$</font>? You should meet her and build up trust with the refugees.

If you sincerely help the refugees, I believe you can build up trust. Please meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004574[gender:1]$</font> and resolve the hardship <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> is facing.
Please meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004574[gender:1]$</font> and resolve the hardship <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> is facing.
I have dreamed of this moment.
(Say that you pity the circumstances of the refugees.)
If Humanitas and $MyPCName$ continue to try, the lives of the refugees will get better. Let's protect them together.
Good job. I'll see you again for the next mission.
Did you know, $MyPCName$?
Humanitas special forces have finally caught up to your mission completion rate. It's the result of you being their example by putting their effort into the mission.
<font color="#909090">(Don't know if that's a compliment or inciting competition...)</font>
Well, they might soon surpass you in the mission completion rate.
<font color="#909090">(You know she's inciting competition but you can't refuse...)</font>
(Say that you will volunteer for the special mission.)
Great! I'll transmit the mission to you via the Humanitas operation HUD. Don't let your guard down and complete the mission.
Great! I'll transmit the mission to you via the Humanitas operation HUD. Don't let your guard down and complete the mission.
You completed the mission perfectly. I'm upset but my troops have a long way to catch up to you.
Good work, $MyPCName$.
Why are you late? $MyPCName$!
(Say that she looks very excited.)
It's because we found Kharon's base! Kharon has been kidnapping refugees all over Kidel, but we couldn't find their base.
The desperate efforts of the Humanitas Intelligence Agency finally found one of their bases.
We don't know if it's their headquarter or a branch, but the second in Kharon's ranks, <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022900$</font>, is said to be there.

$MyPCName$, I would like to request a mission. Please go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:52100114$</font> which is linked to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font> and eliminate <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022900$</font>.
Please go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:52100114$</font> which is linked to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font> and eliminate <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022900$</font>.
You're back, $MyPCName$. Did you suppress <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022900$</font> completely?
Yep.
Kharon would have received a huge blow with the success of this operation. Good work, $MyPCName$.
Glad you're here, $MyPCName$. You know the local animal called Poing, right?
(Say that you know and that it isn't a threat.)
If it's not exposed to aetherine. We obtained intel that the Poings exposed to aetherine attacked the Leshy and the damage is great.
The reason why it was exposed to aetherine hasn't been revealed yet.
Humanitas is also responsible since aetherine is a product of our scientific civilization. The Leshy lived in peace before our war with Tairen.
Please meet <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004620[gender:0]$</font> and help the Leshy that are in danger.
Please meet <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004620[gender:0]$</font> and help the Leshy that are in danger.
You're back. We're a step closer to the Leshy due to your performance.
Well done.
I've been eagerly awaiting your call, $MyPCName$.
What is it?
As you know, the Maple Alliance and Humanitas succeeded in driving the Daemon Army up north in Kidel. However, <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font> is still impregnable.
We made many sacrifices, but we have yet to pass the entrance of the fortress. Humanitas can't proceeed with this operation if the losses continue.
$MyPCName$, we are in need of your power at this moment. Please assault <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font> and suppress the Daemon Army forces.

If you could do that, the allied forces will be able to infiltrate deep into <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font>. I'm sorry for giving you difficult missions all the time, but you're the only one who can take this on.
Please assault <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font> and suppress the Daemon Army forces.
You have returned safely, $MyPCName$. I was worried because it was a difficult mission.
(Say that you suppressed as many of the Daemon Army forces in <font color="#ffd200"> as you could.)
We will deploy troops to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font> immediately. Hopefully, we'll be able to take over the fortress this time...
Are you ready, $MyPCName$?
(What do you mean by ready?)
It's to get ready for the mission given to the Humanitas special forces. $MyPCName$, it won't be easy even for you.
The objective is to train elite agents like you through this mission!
<font color="#909090">(Feels like she's stirring up competition to do this mission.)</font>
What are you doing?! Depart. The mission will be transmitted to you via the Humanitas operation HUD.
Depart. The mission will be transmitted to you via the Humanitas operation HUD.
...You took care of the mission perfectly and quickly. Our soliders are only at 40% completion.
(Say that she doesn't look happy.)
I will need to intensify the training of the special forces. They have a long way to go to be like you.
(Tell her not to give the soldiers a hard time.)
Would I, the leader of the Humanitas, do that? Please call <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004615[gender:0]$</font> right away. I need to speak with him urgently.
<font color="#909090">(...Her words and actions are different!)</font>
Did you know, $MyPCName$?
The place where <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020070$</font> and <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font> were built used to be a farm belt managed by Tairen.
Automated harvester robots tended the farmland and harvested for the Tairen citizens to have an abundant table. When the lands were ruined, the robots were pulled out and farming stopped...
But for some reason, 2 Tairen guard robots that defended the farm remained. The problem is that they attack anything in sight whether it's the Daemon Army or our allied forces.
This is a big obstacle for our allies in attacking <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020070$</font> and <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font>.
$MyPCName$, the mission this time is to destroy the Tairen surveillance robot.

Please destroy <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022800$</font> in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020070$</font> and <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022810$</font> in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font>.

Please destroy <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022800$</font> in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020070$</font> and <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022810$</font> in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font>.
I received a report regarding the operation from the scout team. The 2 robots have been completely destroyed.
Good work, $MyPCName$.
I apologize for the urgent call, $MyPCName$. Tairen started to attack <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font>.
I think they're making a move to prevent Humanitas from increasing its forces by absorbing the refugees.
We don't have any details, but <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> is definitely in crisis.
Please meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004574[gender:1]$</font> and get a clear understanding of the situation. Then help the refugees.
Please meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004574[gender:1]$</font> and get a clear understanding of the situation. Then help the refugees.
Welcome, $MyPCName$. How was the situation in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font>?
(Say that the Tairen soldiers invaded and you stopped them.)
That's fortunate. $MyPCName$, you saved many lives today.
(Ask why she looks serious.)
In order to get food, Kharon is kidnapping refugees that went to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font>.
We are now able to help the refugees that were isolated because of the appearance of the Daemon Army... we will no longer watch Kharon harass the refugees.
(Say that you agree and will leave immediately to help the refugees.)
Thank you, $MyPCName$. Please go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> immediately and meet $npc:11004574[gender:1]$.
She will provide you with the necessary help and supplies for the refugees.
Please go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004574[gender:1]$</font>.
(Say that Kharon won't be kidnapping the refugees for a while.)
It would be great if it was 'anymore' instead of for a while. Let's make a world where Kharon won't kidnap the refugees anymore.
Good work again, $MyPCName$.
The allied special forces suffered greatly. Maybe the mission given to them was too difficult...
I wanted to produce elite agents like you through difficult missions... I guess I was too greedy.
(Tell her to not blame herself.)
I want to give those you lost their comrade some time to rest. $MyPCName$, could you take on this mission instead of the special forces? It will be a very dangerous and difficult mission.
(Say that you'll gladly take on it.)
Thank you, $MyPCName$. I'm always indebted to you. I will transmit the mission to you via the Humanitas operation HUD.
$MyPCName$, could you take on this mission instead of the special forces? It will be a very dangerous and difficult mission.
That was a very difficult mission but... you completed it perfectly.
It would be great if you could be the commander of the special forces. But that's impossible since you are a member of the Maple Alliance...
Good work, $MyPCName$.
Welcome, $MyPCName$. We obtained information that the Daemon Army is polluting the forest to steal the 'mysterious power' of the Leshy.
(Ask what the mysterious power is.)
We don't know anything other than it was given to a large flying being a long time ago, and it causes a huge explosion when resonating with aetherine.
The intelligence department predicts the Daemon Army will become a great threat to Humanitas and the Maple Alliance if this power falls into their hand.
We are also curious why the Daemon Army isn't attacking <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> directly, but tainting the forest with darkness.
Please, $MyPCName$. Go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004620[gender:0]$</font> to help prevent the mysterious power from getting stolen.
Go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004620[gender:0]$</font> to help prevent the mysterious power from getting stolen.
You're back, $MyPCName$. Did you stop the pollution of the forest?
(Say that you defeated the lifeforms encroached by the dark power, but was unable to stop the pollution of the forest itself.)
That gave us more time to protect the mysterious power. Good work, $MyPCName$.
Ah! Did you find out why the Daemon Army is trying to encroach the Leshy with the dark power to steal the 'mysterious power' instead of attacking directly?
(Say that you didn't find out.)
There are still many things about the Leshy we need to find out. Looks like we need to find out gradually.
Good work, $MyPCName$.
The lifeforms encroached by the dark power are heading for <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> according to the squad.

You know you move according to the Daemon Army's will when you're encroached by the dark power, right? I think the Daemon Army is moving those that got encroached to steal the 'mysterious power' passed down to the Leshy.
That's all the intel obtained by the squad.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font>, grasp the situation, and help the Leshy.)
Would you do that? Then I leave this to you, $MyPCName$. Please go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004620[gender:0]$</font>.
Please go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004620[gender:0]$</font>.
(Say that you defeated the Leshies and Wasplings encroached by the dark power trying to steal the 'mysterious power.')
Good work. We are helping to prevent the 'mysterious power' from falling into the hand of the Daemon Army but... it would be helpful if we knew the substance of the mysterious power.
(Say that they will never tell strangers about it.)
...Seeing how the Daemon Army is obsessed, I'm sure it's a strong power. We need to give our all and prevent it from falling into their hand.
Good work again, $MyPCName$.
I'm sorry for the urgent call, $MyPCName$. But this is an emergency situation.
Both <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> and <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font> are being attacked simultaneously by Kharon.
(Ask whether Kharon launched a full-scale attack to take <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font>.)
We can't make that judgment yet since we don't have enough information.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004574[gender:1]$</font> to help.)
I knew you would say that. Then depart now.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004574[gender:1]$</font> to help.)
You came back faster than I thought. How is the situation over there?
(Say that you saved <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> that almost fell to the Kharon commanders.)
<font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> almost fell because of the Kharon commanders?
(You told <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004614[gender:1]$</font> what you talked about with <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004574[gender:1]$</font>.)
...That's one more thing I need to worry about. Kharon will send another capable commander now that they know their operation worked.
(Tell her not to worry and that you will go stop them again.)
Just saying that is a consolation. Good work again, $MyPCName$.
I'm a bit busy right now, $MyPCName$. Could you come back later?
What is it?
I'm reorganizing the troop with the most injured. The troops deployed to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020070$</font> suffered great loss.

As you know, <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020070$</font> is a gateway to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font>. We need to get through <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020070$</font> to take <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font>.
However, the loss to our allies are increasing due to the strong defense of <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020070$</font>.
(Say that you will suppress the Daemon Army forces in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020070$</font> open a path.)
I wouldn't dare say it first because this mission is very dangerous but... could you do that for us? $MyPCName$, I believe you can do it.
(Say that you will suppress the Daemon Army forces in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020070$</font> and open a path.)
(Say that you suppressed the Daemon Army forces in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020070$</font> and opened a path.)
Thank you so much. You saved the lives of countless Humanitas military personnels.
We will deploy troops to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020070$</font> immediately. Hopefully, we'll be able to take over the fortress this time...
Hunting in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> decreased noticeably. Hunting is the main source of food for the residents here...
I'm sure there's a problem.
(Ask whether it's because Kharon kidnapped the refugees.)
No, Kharon has been relatively quiet these days. It must be something else.
$MyPCName$, could you go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> and find out the cause?
You might find out the cause if you meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004574[gender:1]$</font>.
$MyPCName$, could you go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> and find out the cause? You might find out the cause if you meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004574[gender:1]$</font>.
(Say that the reason the refugees couldn't hunt was because of the beasts trained by Kharon.)
Those Kharon... kidnapping wasn't enough and they went this far... it looks like they're planning to gather the residents into a single place and kidnap them all at once.
I won't let that happen. Good work again, $MyPCName$.
The activities of the members of the Maple Alliance are well known amongst the Humanitas regular army here in Kidel. $MyPCName$, you played a big role in that.
Humanitas has formed the special forces to enhance the capabilities of our soldiers. Our objective is to train exceptional agents like you. This force will be composed of the most elite of Humanitas.
The mission of the special forces is very dangerous and complicated. Ah! $MyPCName$, would you like to volunteer for this mission as well?
I believe you can become an example to the special forces if you take on this mission together. Many soldiers will be encouraged by it.
(Say that you will volunteer.)
Great! I'll transmit the mission to you via the Humanitas operation HUD. $MyPCName$, this won't be easy even for you. Don't let your guard down and complete the mission.
I'll transmit the mission to you via the Humanitas operation HUD. $MyPCName$, this won't be easy even for you. Don't let your guard down and complete the mission.
You completed the mission perfectly. It would be great if our soldiers could be like you.
Good work, $MyPCName$.
(Say that it feels like there has been a decrease in intel coming from the squad.)
You're very sharp. The squad suffered greatly from the beasts released by the Daemon Army. You've seen them in Kidel, right? Those hideous things with horns...
The loss was especially great in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font> and <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020068$</font>. I believe they were specially trained.
<font color="#909090">(<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004393[gender:0]$</font> is in that squad... you can't stand by and do nothing.)</font>
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font> and <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020068$</font> to suppress the beasts of the Daemon Army.)
Thank you, $MyPCName$. Let's show them that they can't push Humanitas around.
Please go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font> and <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020068$</font> to suppress the beasts of the Daemon Army.
I have dreamed of this moment.
(Say that you suppressed the beasts of the Daemon Army that attacked the squad.)
I didn't tell you because you might be worried, but <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004393[gender:0]$</font> was receiving treatment for getting bitten by the beast.
I'm sure <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004393[gender:0]$</font> will also be happy. Good work, $MyPCName$.
$MyPCName$, there have been signs of a schism in the Leshy. According to the squad, a group of Leshies indulging in violence formed.

I'm worried that <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004620[gender:0]$</font> the peackeeper is losing leadership. I think you should meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004620[gender:0]$</font> and understand the situation.
$MyPCName$, please head for <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> immediately.
I think you should meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004620[gender:0]$</font> and understand the situation. $MyPCName$, please head for <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> immediately.
You're back, $MyPCName$. Did you find out the inside story with the schism in the Leshy?
(You told <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004614[gender:1]$</font> what you talked about with <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004620[gender:0]$</font>.)
On the surface, they shout for the expulsion of strangers. But they are actually hoodlums committing all sorts of wrong deeds...
As long as the Daemon Army doesn't give up on trying to steal the 'mysterious power' of the Leshy, more of such groups will continue to appear.
I will be needing your help in the future. Good work, $MyPCName$.
We are recruiting for the Humanitas special forces, but not many signed up this time.
Everyone want to sign up in the beginning but... the signup rate has been dropping since they take on very dangerous missions.
I think it's time to create another legend for the special forces mission. You know what I mean, right?
Take a nap?
If you set a new record for the mission completion rate, everyone will want to sign up for the special forces. $MyPCName$, you're the object of envy in the Humanitas regular army.
<font color="#909090">(Feels like you got hooked...)</font>
Alright! I will transmit the mission via the Humanitas operation HUD. Please set a new record!
Alright! I will transmit the mission via the Humanitas operation HUD. Please set a new record!
Perfect... this mission completion rate will gather a cloud of people wanting to sign up for the special forces.
You didn't let me down again this time. Good work, $MyPCName$.
A ghost, no way...
What is it?
It's a one-horned winged monster that hides in the dark and attacks our allies.
The allied soldiers attacking <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020070$</font> and <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font> are afraid after getting attacked by it.
It looks fearsome... I understand why they're afraid as it disappears completely after attacking stealthily but...
But rumors of it being a ghost among the soldiers are demoralizing them.
(Say that you want to go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020070$</font> and <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font> to see it.)
You're not going to see only, right? $MyPCName$, please suppress the one-horned winged monster of the Daemon Army.
Please go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020070$</font> and <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font> to suppress the one-horned winged monster of the Daemon Army.
(Say that you suppressed the one-horned winged monster of the Daemon Army.)
You sure are amazing, $MyPCName$. I need to hurry and send this fact over the Humanitas regular army network.
No more ghost rumors will be going around thanks to you. Good work again, $MyPCName$.
We received intel that the number of surveillance drones in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> decreased noticeably.
I'm talking about the drones in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> to detect attacks from Kharon.
I know all about it!
It will be hard to defend <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> with the decrease in drones... I'm worried why the number in operation was reduced.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004574[gender:1]$</font> to find out.)
Would you do that, $MyPCName$? After you grasp the situation, let me know if you need help.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004574[gender:1]$</font> to find out.)
You're back, $MyPCName$. Did you figure out why the number of drones decreased?
(You talked about what happened in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font>.)
Using the parts from <font color="#ffd200">Sect</font> was a great idea! Who would be able to think of this but you?
Good work again, $MyPCName$.
Welcome, $MyPCName$. Could you go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font>?
What is it?
It's not that something happened but... I'm concerned of the refugees living in a dangerous and barren land.
<font color="#909090">(Looks like <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004614[gender:1]$</font> is very concerned of the refugees...)</font>
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004574[gender:1]$</font> to resolve any difficulties there.)
Thank you, $MyPCName$. I look forward to your great results again.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004574[gender:1]$</font> to resolve any difficulties there.)
Welcome, $MyPCName$. What help did you give the refugees this time?
(You talked about what happened in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font>.)
Removing <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001354$</font> from the magic wand of <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022204$</font>... That's a great idea!
You'll probably be called the 'savior of the refugees' by now. Good work again, $MyPCName$.
(Say that she looks worried.)
We received intel that Kharon activity increased noticeably near <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font>.
That's where the refugees hunt the most... For their livelihood, they even risk the danger of getting kidnapped.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004574[gender:1]$</font> to understand the situation.)
Could you do that? Thank you, $MyPCName$.
Since the situation could be critical, please move out immediately.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004574[gender:1]$</font> to understand the situation.)
You're finally back, $MyPCName$.
(Say that Kharon's kidnapping season returned and many refugees have been kidnapped.)
It can't be! Is <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> fine?
(Say that you defeated the Kharon forces that kidnapped the refugees and there won't be any victims for a while.)
That's a relief. Let's work hard to prevent this from happening again, $MyPCName$.
(Say that you'll work together.)
Those monsters... I won't let them be!
What is it?
I heard from <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004393[gender:0]$</font>, who came back from scouting, about Kharon harassing the refugees for fun.
<font color="#909090">(Those jerks... something has to be done.)</font>
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004574[gender:1]$</font> to teach them a lesson.)
I leave it to you, $MyPCName$. Since this is urgent, please depart immediately.
Please go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> immediately and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004574[gender:1]$</font>!
(Say that <font color="#ffd200">$npcNamePlural:25022306$</font> in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font> were throwing knives at the refugees for fun.)
Those animals! You didn't let them be, did you?
(Say that you suppressed all of them.)
...When will this world go back to being normal?
(Say that you'll help until then.)
You're reliable, $MyPCName$. I will do my best as well.
There's something that's always troubling my mind. It's like a small fish bone caught in your throat.
(Ask what it's about.)
It's about the Daemon Army trying to steal the 'mysterious power' of the Leshy.
I would like to tighten the security of <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font>... but the Leshy will not allow Humanitas to station there...
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004620[gender:0]$</font> to find a solution.)
I'm always receiving your help. Thank you, $MyPCName$.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004620[gender:0]$</font> to find a solution.)
Welcome, $MyPCName$. Did you find a way to tighten the security of <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font>?
(You told <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004614[gender:1]$</font> what happened in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> and <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font>.)
Embedding <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001355$</font> on the cudgel of the Leshy...
Yes! The Daemon Army were cut by the sharp poison stinger they happened to encounter. It will definitely be a big help in increasing the combat power of the Leshy!
You completed the mission neatly again. Good work, $MyPCName$.
(Say that she looks disturbed.)
I haven't slept lately.
(Ask why she didn't sleep.)
$MyPCName$, you won't understand. You don't know the weight of responsibility shouldered by the leader of Humanitas...
(Ask if there's anything you can help.)
Then... could you get me <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001356$</font>? I heard it's good for sleeping when placed in the bedroom.
<font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022407$</font> is said to inhabit <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020068$</font>.
(Say that you'll get it.)
Could you get me <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001356$</font>? I heard it's good for sleeping when placed in the bedroom.
Oh! Is this <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001356$</font>?!
And you brought this much... You must have made a lot of effort, $MyPCName$. But my skin is important.
(Ask whether she just said skin.)
Ah, no... I meant my skin will become better if I get to sleep.
(Question her whether <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001356$</font> has an effect for skin care.)
Hm... $MyPCName$, you have a lot of questions unlike yourself.
I want to rest. Please leave, $MyPCName$.
We received intel that lifeforms inhabiting near <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> started to surround the nest.
The intelligence department predicts the Daemon Army encroached the lifeforms and are controlling them.
If that prediction is right, <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> will be attacked by the lifeforms controlled by the Daemon Army if nothing is done about it.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004620[gender:0]$</font> to find a solution.)
Thank you, $MyPCName$. I trust you this time as well.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004620[gender:0]$</font> to find a solution.)
Welcome, $MyPCName$.
(Say that the lifeforms encroached by the dark power tried to attack <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font>.)
The prediction of the intelligence department was right. It was a ploy by the Daemon Army to steal the 'mysterious power' of the Leshy.
(Say that you completely suppressed them.)
Perfect as always. Good work, $MyPCName$.
We received intel that the atmosphere in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> became chaotic. Leshies doing business decreased... and there are even Leshies who don't leave their home.
There are no changes to the movements of the Daemon Army in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font>... I'm sure something else is happening.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004620[gender:0]$</font> to understand the situation.)
Would you do that? Then I leave it to you, $MyPCName$.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004620[gender:0]$</font> to understand the situation.)
What was going on in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font>?
(You told <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004614[gender:1]$</font> what happened in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font>.)
Leshy hoodlums created with the excuse of driving out strangers... I feel uncomfortable because we are also responsible for their creation.
(Say that you suppressed them to prevent them hanging around near <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font>.)
Thank you for the trouble, $MyPCName$. You always take care of things perfectly.
How did the Daemon Army make the mechanical soldiers of Tairen come under their command?
(Ask if she's talking about the mechanical soldiers that turned evil.)
Yes, those machines that turned dark and are controlled by the Daemon Army. The Humanitas Research Institute is making various efforts to investigate the cause.
$MyPCName$, the research could make progress if you could get the parts of the mechanical soldiers that turned evil.
(Ask which parts are needed.)
<font color="#ffd200">$item:30001357$</font> of the mechanical soldiers deployed to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font>. It's a dark, square conductor made of metal.
(Say that you'll take care of it immediately.)
<font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font> has tight security. Be careful, $MyPCName$.
It's <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001357$</font> deployed to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font>. It's a dark, square conductor made of metal.
(Say that you retrieved <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001357$</font> that turned evil.)
The battle must have been fierce, but you brought it without any damage. Your skills are amazing, $MyPCName$.
Well done.
The attack on <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020070$</font> failed again. It's because of <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022601$</font> of the Daemon Army.
They watch our allied soldiers from the air and then attack at lightning speed. That speed is physically impossible.
The views of the research team is that damage to our allies can be reduced if the principle of that extreme speed can be studied.

$MyPCName$, could you go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020070$</font> and get <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001358$</font>? If the research team could analyze it, they might be able to reduce the damage to our allies.
Leave it to me.
Then I leave it to you, $MyPCName$.
Could you go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020070$</font> and get <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001358$</font>?
(Say that you brought <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001358$</font>.)
I'll send it to the research team immediately to ask them to research it. Once the research succeeds, the damage to our allies will be reduced significantly.
Good work again, $MyPCName$.
You don't look well. Are you feeling all right?
The Humanitas military hospital is overflowing with patients. The patients are lying down outside the hospital as there aren't enough rooms.
(Ask whether many soldiers got injured in the operation.)
No, all of them were bitten by robot spiders in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font>.
They inhabit <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font> and bite any lifeform that moves.
Your entire body becomes paralyzed once bitten by the robot spiders. We have no choice but to dispatch even more soldiers to evacuate the paralyzed soldiers.
<font color="#909090">(The situation is serious... the mounting damage has to be stopped.)</font>
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font> and suppress the robot spiders.)
Would you do that? Thank you very much, $MyPCName$.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font> and suppress the robot spiders.)
(Say that you suppressed the robot spiders in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font>.)
You succeeded! Our soldiers won't get paralyzed by them for a while.
Peace will now return to the Humanitas military hospital. Good work, $MyPCName$.
Sigh... another failure...
What is it?
The attack on <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font> failed again. It's because of that winged one-horned monster of the Daemon Army.
They watch the soldiers from the air, attack at lightning speed, and disappear without a trace. The soldiers fall into chaos, scattering their battle formation.
<font color="#909090">(This stimulates your competitive spirit... you want to contend against it.)</font>
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font> immediately and face the winged one-horned monster.)
Hm, today... you seem very willing. Then please depart, $MyPCName$.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font> immediately and face the winged one-horned monster.)
(Say that you suppressed the winged one-horned monster in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font>.)
That easily? Even the allied special forces took a huge blow... $MyPCName$, I don't know what your limit is.
Good work. I will deploy the allied troops to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020071$</font> right away.
Welcome, $MyPCName$. I would like you to urgently go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020034$</font>.
(Ask what is going on.)

Aetherine production in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020030$</font> isn't going smoothly due to the prolonged war with Tairen. It's because the parts in the aetherine reactor are old and aren't performing as they should.

<font color="#ffd200">$map:02020034$</font> has aetherine generators set up by Tairen. If you could get the part called <font color="#ffd200">STX-17</font> from the generator, the aetherine reactor in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020030$</font> will be able to perform as it should.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020034$</font> and get <font color="#ffd200">STX-17</font>.)
<font color="#ffd200">STX-17</font> is in the shape of a rhombus inside the aetherine generator. I'll leave this to you, $MyPCName$.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020034$</font> and get <font color="#ffd200">STX-17</font>.)
(Say that you got <font color="#ffd200">STX-17</font>.)
Yes, these are the parts. Those Tairen... they replaced the parts recently. These are brand new.
I will send them to the tech team to replace the old parts. Good work, $MyPCName$.
Emergency situation. The intelligence department found Tairen's <font color="#ffd200">$map:52100115$</font> in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020013$</font>.
Tairen is planning to link <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020010$</font> and <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020013$</font> with a highway.
Once the highway is constructed, <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020013$</font> the ally supply route will be attacked by Tairen forces from <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020010$</font>.
They will take the highway and go straight to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020013$</font>.
<font color="#909090">(That means the collapse of the Humanitas supply route. The construction of that highway cannot be completed.)</font>
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:52100115$</font> and stop the highway construction from being completed by suppressing the forces sent there.)
This is why I trust you. Please depart immediately, $MyPCName$.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:52100115$</font> and stop the highway construction from being completed by suppressing the forces sent there.)
(Say that you stopped the highway construction by suppressing the forces in <font color="#ffd200">$map:52100115$</font>.)
$MyPCName$, the precious supply route of Humanitas has been protected because of you. I would like to thank you on behalf of Humanitas.
The reconnaissance team discovered <font color="#ffd200">$map:52100116$</font> in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020003$</font>.
Analyzing the video footage revealed it to be a warehouse storing food. The food was obtained by forcing the kidnapped refugees into hard labor.
If you attack <font color="#ffd200">$map:52100116$</font> and neutralize the Kharon forces, the allied soldiers can seize the food.
A huge blow can be dealt to Kharon if we can do that. And this is a chance for our allies to stock up on rations.

As soon as you're done with preparations, go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:52100116$</font> in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020003$</font>, and neutralize <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25023100[gender:0]$</font> and <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25023101[gender:0]$</font>.

As soon as you're done with preparations, go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:52100116$</font> in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020003$</font>, and neutralize <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25023100[gender:0]$</font> and <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25023101[gender:0]$</font>.
(Say that you suppressed the Kharon forces in <font color="#ffd200">$map:52100116$</font>.)
That was faster than expected. Did you really suppress all of the forces?
Yep.
Amazing, $MyPCName$. I will send the regular army immediately to transport the food to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020030$</font>.
Tairen placed an explosive in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020014$</font>.
<font color="#909090">(<font color="#ffd200">$map:02020014$</font> is cherished by Captain <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004616[gender:1]$</font>...)</font>
I know, but <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020014$</font> was built to preserve and study the flora and fauna of Kidel.
It's like an atonement for devastating Kidel with war. Tairen placed an explosive as if mocking that meaning.
They are thinking of blowing up all of <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020014$</font> seeing the scale of the explosive. The intelligence department thinks their intention is to demoralize Humanitas.
<font color="#909090">(You will never let them destroy <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020014$</font>.)</font>
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020014$</font> and disarm the explosive placed by Tairen.)
It will be a difficult task, but I believe you'll be able to do it, $MyPCName$. The <font color="#ffd200">MK42 explosive</font> is a very elaborate device.
Please be careful that the explosive doesn't go off.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020014$</font> and disarm the explosive placed by Tairen.)
(Say that you disarmed all of the explosives placed in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020014$</font>.)
We protected the precious place that was built with everyone's strength! We will try harder to preserve the ecosystem of Kidel.
Good work, $MyPCName$.
Did you know Kharon planted a spy disguised as a refugee in Humanitas? The spy was selling stolen information to Tairen.

In return for the information, Tairen regularly provided Kharon with supplies. We obtained intel that Kharon has been releasing some of the <font color="#ffd200">supply box</font> to the Leshy hoodlums.
I think they're trying to win over the Leshy hoodlums and mobilize them in kidnapping refugees. The kidnapping of the refugees will be accelerated if the Leshy hoodlums are won over.
Please go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020008$</font> and seize the <font color="#ffd200">supply box</font> before it goes to the Leshy hoodlums.
Please go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020008$</font> and seize the <font color="#ffd200">supply box</font> before it goes to the Leshy hoodlums.
(Say that none of the <font color="#ffd200">supply boxes</font> went to the Leshy hoodlums and were seized.)
You did it, $MyPCName$. Thank you for doing a great job.
<font color="#ffd200">$map:02020018$</font> is a temple of ancient Kritias. No one know who built the temple and for what purpose since it was a long, long time ago.
This place was discovered by chance after moving to Kidel to fight back Tairen. The research team is investigating the relics from <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020018$</font> emitting a blue light.
We haven't found the identity of the blue light or the function of the relic yet, but we won't give and will continue the research.
$MyPCName$, if you could go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020018$</font> and get the <font color="#ffd200">shiny blue relic</font>, the research could make big progress.
Leave it to me.
Thank you, $MyPCName$. Please get ones that aren't damaged for the research.
$MyPCName$, if you could go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020018$</font> and get the <font color="#ffd200">shiny blue relic</font>, the research could make big progress.
(Say that you got the <font color="#ffd200">shiny blue relic</font> from <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020018$</font>.)
This blue light... it's a completely different energy from aetherine! It will take time, but the research team will definitely find out the identity of this blue light.
Good work again, $MyPCName$.

The intelligence team found the secret residence of the Leshy hoodlums after much effort. The place called <font color="#ffd200">$map:52100117$</font> exists in a secret place in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020008$</font>.
The Leshy hoodlums made it their base, attacking strangers and expanding their forces. They cry for the overthrow of strangers, but they're just a violent gang that assaults and extorts.
We can deal them a huge blow if we attack their base.
Please go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:52100117$</font> and suppress the Leshy hoodlums.
Please go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:52100117$</font> and suppress the Leshy hoodlums.
(Say that you went to <font color="#ffd200">$map:52100117$</font> and suppressed the Leshy hoodlums.)
You always take care of it neatly. It's going to take them a long time to recover their forces.
I won't forget your contribution to Kidel's peace.
Why the long face?
The Humanitas-Maple Alliance surprise attack on <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020037$</font> failed.
As you know, there's a huge barrier in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020037$</font> built by Tairen. And beyond that barrier is Tairen...
Even before we got to attack the enemies defending <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020037$</font>, we had to retreat after getting caught by the <font color="#ffd200">intruder detection sensor</font>.
Future surprise attacks won't be possible as long as the high performance <font color="#ffd200">intruder detection sensors</font> are all over <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020037$</font>.
(Say that you will infiltrate <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020037$</font> stealthily and turn off the <font color="#ffd200">intruder detection sensor</font>.)
If you could do that, then the Humanitas-Maple Alliance forces can make a surprise attack on <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020037$</font>.
It won't be easy, but I leave this to you, $MyPCName$.
(Say that you will infiltrate <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020037$</font> stealthily and turn off the <font color="#ffd200">intruder detection sensor</font>.)
(Say that you turned off all of the <font color="#ffd200">intruder detection sensors</font> in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020037$</font>.)
You pulled off something big, $MyPCName$. I will contact Captain <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:11004616[gender:1]$</font> immediately and set up a surprise attack.
$MyPCName$, your performance actually brought disaster to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> this time.
What are you talking about?
You blocked Kharon's attack on <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> many times, and they became furious because of that.
We obtained intel that the angered Kharon forces are throwing grenades indiscriminately at <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font>.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> immediately and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004574[gender:1]$</font> to defeat the Kharon forces.)
That will be good idea. I leave this to you, $MyPCName$.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> immediately and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004574[gender:1]$</font> to defeat the Kharon forces.)
I have dreamed of this moment.
(Say that you defeated all of the Kharon forces throwing grenades at <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font>.)
Destroying without purpose... Kharon is very cruel... Don't wince and protect the refugees together, $MyPCName$.
(Say that you will never give up on the refugees.)
As expected of $MyPCName$! I will do my best as well.
I suddenly thought... what kind of woman do men of Maple World like?
(Say that you aren't sure since it's different per person.)
(Ask why she is curious.)
I know, I wonder why I'm curious. No, no, I'm not curious at all... I just asked.
Now, let's start the briefing. You know that <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001359$</font> is on the tail of <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022202$</font>, right?
Analyzing the ore will be helpful in figuring out its structure. If it succeeds, Humanitas will also be able to design a four-footed weapon.
Now, hurry to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> and get <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001359$</font> from the tail of <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022202$</font>.
Now, hurry to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> and get <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001359$</font> from the tail of <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022202$</font>.
This is <font color="#ffd200">$item:30001359$</font> from <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022202$</font>!
It's my first time seeing one this close. It's dazzingly beautiful!
It gives off a different light from all angles... It will be very beautiful if made into a necklace.
(Ask whether she just said the ore will be made into a necklace.)
Huh? No... I'm just saying.
(Say that you will deliver the ore to the research team on your way back.)
I will not permit that. I'm going out for a walk and will do that myself.
Good work, $MyPCName$.
The Daemon Army forces stationed in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font> have strengthened recently.
They haven't attacked the refugees yet, but we need to find out why their forces have strengthened.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004574[gender:1]$</font> to find out why the Daemon Army strengthened its forces.)
That will be a good idea. Please depart immediately, $MyPCName$.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004574[gender:1]$</font> to find out why the Daemon Army strengthened its forces.)
You're back, $MyPCName$. Why did the Daemon Army strengthen their forces in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font>?
(Say that you had no choice but to suppress them because they came at you stubbornly.)
(Say that you're sure they're not trying to turn <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font> evil.)
I see... we'll slowly give time and figure out the true nature of the facility. Good work, $MyPCName$.
Those devils!
What is it?
The squad witnessed refugees kidnapped by Kharon in <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020067$</font>.
They had no time to take action because the refugees were put in the vehicle and left.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004574[gender:1]$</font> to find a way to rescue the refugees.)
Thank you, $MyPCName$. Please give hope to the refugees.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020066$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004574[gender:1]$</font> to find a way to rescue the refugees.)
(Say that you weren't able to rescue the kidnapped refugees, but you gave <font color="#ffd200">Kharon Beast's Meat</font> to the refugees that were short on food.)
Seems like the kidnapped refugees were hunters... It's sad, but thank you for resolving the food shortage for the refugees, $MyPCName$.
Since you don't give up and help the refugees, they won't lose hope. I thank you on behalf of everyone in Kritias, $MyPCName$.
There are rumors going around that <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020068$</font> is struck with fear.
Some lifeform is roaming around the forest like mad and attacking the Leshy. Let me correct that. It's attacking anything that is alive and not just the Leshy.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004620[gender:0]$</font> to understand the situation.)
Then I leave it to you, $MyPCName$.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004620[gender:0]$</font> to understand the situation.)
I have been waiting, $MyPCName$. Did you find the subject that struck the forest with fear?
(Say that <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022402$</font> that was encroached by the dark power went mad after its mind broke down.)
Daemon Army... I will never forgive them... None of them will leave Kritias.
Did you lay <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022402$</font> to rest?
Yep.
It was perfect again, $MyPCName$.
I think our exchange with the Leshy became distant because we have been busy taking care of the refugees.
(Say that you talked to <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004620[gender:0]$</font> not too long ago.)
That's exactly it. If we can talk a little more, we will reach a level where we can commune with the Leshy.
If our sincerity is accepted, we will be a step close to the true nature of that mysterious power.
<font color="#909090">(It feels like you got hooked, but you have no choice and have to go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font>...)</font>
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004620[gender:0]$</font> to help the Leshy.)
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004620[gender:0]$</font> to help the Leshy.)
Welcome, $MyPCName$. Did you help the Leshy?
(Say that you got the Leshy <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022405$ Extract</font> to repair their temple.)
You didn't get covered in extract, did you?
(Say that you had a hard time because your body was covered with the sticky <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022405$ Extract</font>.)
Don't come near me... I mean... good work, $MyPCName$. Hurry back and wash... take a rest.
Welcome, $MyPCName$. I was thinking of calling you.
What is it?

We obtained intel that the ecosystem near <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> is thrown into confusion. Something like a spore scattered everywhere, and the animals of the forest are going wild because of it.
Could you go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> and investigate?
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004620[gender:0]$</font> to find a solution.)
I knew you would say that. Then depart now.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004620[gender:0]$</font> to find a solution.)
You're back, $MyPCName$. What was the cause of the confusion in the ecosystem?
(Say that the pollen of <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022504$</font> made the animals to hallucinate.)
Pollen of <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022504$</font>?! But it's really good for the skin... Then what happened?
(Say that you reduced the number of <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022504$</font>.)
(Say that you won't see pollen of <font color="#ffd200">$npcName:25022504$</font> for a while.)
...I see. Good work.
(Say that she looks sad.)
You have a lot of questions today. Please leave, $MyPCName$.
Welcome, $MyPCName$. This is an emergency situation. <font color="#ffd200">$npcNamePlural:25022505$</font> broke into <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> and it's a mess.
<font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> is in chaos because they push around and attack the Leshy.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> immediately and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004620[gender:0]$</font> to help the Leshy.)
We have no time to waste. Since this is an emergency, please depart immediately.
(Say that you will go to <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font> immediately and meet <font color="#ffd200">$npc:11004620[gender:0]$</font> to help the Leshy.)
(Say that you destroyed <font color="#ffd200">$npcNamePlural:25022505$</font> pushing around <font color="#ffd200">$map:02020069$</font>.)
